actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to restore the traditional observance of Memorial Day and Veterans Day.

summary.text: Changes the legal public holiday designated as Memorial Day from the last Monday in May to May 30th. Authorizes and requests the President to issue a proclamation calling upon the people of the United States to observe Memorial Day and Veterans Day as days for prayer and ceremonies showing respect for American veterans.

titles.title: A bill to restore the traditional observance of Memorial Day and Veterans Day.
